overview: For over ten years now Staxus has been producing the very best gay porn with the help of some of the hottest, horniest young guys on the planet, to become Europe's biggest and best-loved label in the biz. So come with us - literally - as we celebrate this achievement with a bonanza of a dozen of the very raunchiest, spunk-sodden escapades; featuring thirty of the most cock-crazed, arse-obsessed fuckers ever to appear in front of a camera. Duos, threesomes and even a couple of four-ways - rest assured, twink-on-twink action has never looked so absolutely fan-fucking-tastic.
